metadata.title: CVE-2024-50103 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ASoC: qcom: Fix NULL Dereference in asoc_qcom_lpass_cpu_platform_probe()A devm_kzalloc() in asoc_qcom_lpass_cpu_platform_probe() couldpossibly return NULL pointer. NULL Pointer Dereference may betriggerred without addtional check.Add a NULL check for the returned pointer.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
